subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It is tempting to say that the Josh Hamilt0n deal swings the balance of power in the American League West to the Angels, but we learned last winter that it really doesn’t work that way.
snippet: It is tempting to say that the Josh Hamilt0n deal swings the balance of power in the American League West to the Angels, but we learned last winter that it really doesn’t work that way.
